attributes.action: Gain a tax rebate for the administration burden of managing 15% VAT change
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The 15% change will cause a massive burden to businesses by having to implement additional calculations to ensure the correct level of VAT is charged.  This is particularly true for businesses managing projects over a long period of time and will continue to cause an admin burden again when re-instated to 17.5%
